title: Live: Poland temporarily closes two airports after Russian strikes on Ukraine
summary: Poland has ‍temporarily ​closed two airports in Rzeszow ​and ⁠Lublin after ​the country's armed forces scrambled fighter jets due to ‍Russian strikes ​on Ukraine, according to the Polish Air ‌Navigation Services ‍Agency.
